00013 #include <QVBoxLayout>

00015 ChannelEditor::ChannelEditor(QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00016                                                          void* dataPointer, 
00017                                                          QWidget *parent): 
00018 ItemEditor(component, parent),
00019 component_(component),
00020 channel_(static_cast<Channel*>(dataPointer)),
00021 nameGroup_(this, tr("Names and description")),
00022 interfaceEdit_(component, dataPointer, this) {
00023 
00024         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "ChannelEditor constructor",
00025                 "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00026 
00027         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00028                 this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00029         connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00030                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00031         connect(&interfaceEdit_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00032                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00033 
00034         QVBoxLayout* layout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00035         layout->addWidget(&nameGroup_);
00036         layout->addWidget(&interfaceEdit_);
00037 
00038         nameGroup_.setName(channel_->getName());
00039         nameGroup_.setDisplayName(channel_->getDisplayName());
00040         nameGroup_.setDescription(channel_->getDescription());
00041 
00042         interfaceEdit_.setItems(channel_->getInterfaces());
00043 }
00044 
00045 ChannelEditor::~ChannelEditor() {
00046 }
00047 
00048 bool ChannelEditor::isValid() const {
00049         if (!nameGroup_.isValid())
00050                 return false;
00051         else if (!interfaceEdit_.isValid())
00052                 return false;
00053         
00054         return true;
00055 }
00056 
00057 void ChannelEditor::removeModel() {
00058         component_->removeChannel(channel_->getName());
00059         channel_ = 0;
00060 }
00061 
00062 void ChannelEditor::makeChanges() {
00063         channel_->setName(nameGroup_.getName());
00064         channel_->setDisplayName(nameGroup_.getDisplayName());
00065         channel_->setDescription(nameGroup_.getDescription());
00066 
00067         channel_->setInterfaces(interfaceEdit_.items());
00068 }
